page.title: 20Industry in East Leicester.
page.content: {In the western half of the block, ousing & industry co-exist in the busy streets. Hosiery & clothing manufacture dominate. A majority of older Victorian factories & workshops are owned & run by recently settled families,mainly of Asian origin. More modern (post-war) factories have developed east of the inner-city area, bringing some new manufacturing e.g. chemicals & light engineering. ______________________________________ {CREDITS :- Coleman Junior School , {Bridge Junior School , Sacred Heart RC {Primary School , St.Barnabas CE Junior {School , Mayflower Junior School , {Linden Primary School , Crown Hills {Community College , Mundella Community {College , The City of Leicester School {} ************************
